item.title: Hypothesis Testing
item.description: Hypothesis Testing Outline Step1: Assumptions Step2: Stating hypothesis Step3: Test statistics and its null distribution Step4: P-value and its intepretation Step5: Conclusion Step1: Assumptions c The variable measured is categorical. The data are obtained using randomization. The sample size n is sufficiently large that the sampling distribution of the sample proportion $\hat{p}$ is approximately Normal when the null is true. (This will be true if n⋅p0⋅(1 − p0) ≥ 5, where p0 is the value specified in H0.

item.title: 关于Isoland的一切 ｜ About Isoland
item.description: 这是我的个人网站，希望能在这里记录、分享、感悟、成长。 其实很久以前就有建站的想法，可一直没想好要给她起什么名字，也没想好要写什么，于是便很自
